description: Pepsi is a carbonated soft drink with a cola flavor, manufactured by PepsiCo which serves as its flagship product. In 2023, Pepsi was the second most valuable soft drink brand worldwide behind Coca-Cola ; [ 1 ] the two share a long-standing rivalry in what has been called the " cola wars ". [ 2 ]
release_date: 1893 ; 132 years ago ( 1893 ) (as Brad's Drink ) 1898 ; 127 years ago ( 1898 ) (as Pepsi-Cola ) 1961 ; 64 years ago ( 1961 ) (as Pepsi )
